divs: sighting detailsit was just before bedtime and i was standing in the bathroom. then i see a very bright shine outside my bathroom window. at first i thought it might be a star or venus, but it did shine way brighter than any star. i see an other red light right behind it and the bright ligth has now become weaker. i run outside to my garden to see more clear. the bright light has now started to pulsate and has fade away little. the red light is now stronger. then suddenly i see an other white light and it has became an triangle. it's moving to the west. all the lights is now very weak, and it's just an spot in the sky. all this happends about under two minutes. while i'm seeing the object i dont feel anything, but afterwards i was chocked. i did lose sight of the object (triangle) when it disapared high up. \ [cms\tg\pid]
trends: There has been one other sighting in Malmo
There were no other sightings in Malmo on or around May 2nd 2009
Summary: Strange triangle object in sky over south Sweden.
